H0.text: where are the nordic countries. Scandinavia

H1.text: where are the nordic countries. The Arctic Circle

H2.text: where are the nordic countries. The Baltic Sea Region

H3.text: where are the nordic countries. Northern Europe

A4.text: The Nordic countries are a geographical and cultural region in Northern Europe.

A5.text: Scandinavia is sometimes used as a synonym for the Nordic countries.

A6.text: Countries in northern Europe generally have developed economies and some of the highest standards of living in the world.

A7.text: In the UN geoscheme, the following countries are classified as being in northern Europe: Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Iceland, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom.
